meanings.definition: To enter a building illegally with intent to commit a crime, especially theft.
meanings.sent1: The thief burglarizes the house at night.
meanings.sent2: He burglarizes homes in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky raccoon burglarizes the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: The darkness of night burglarizes the peaceful silence.
meanings.sent5: The sound of breaking glass burglarizes the stillness of the night.

meanings.sent1: The criminal burglarizes for personal gain.
meanings.sent2: She burglarizes to obtain valuable items.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat burglarizes the treat jar.
meanings.sent4: His greed burglarizes his sense of morality.
meanings.sent5: The act of stealing burglarizes the trust between people.
